title: The Power of Stepping Back from Data
text: Stepping back from data allows you to see the bigger picture and focus on key insights instead of the granular details.

title: Purpose of Presenting Data
text: Through presenting data, your audience isn't necessarily focused on visuals.

title: Knowing your audience
text: When you prepare a data presentation, usually you always shape it to your unique audience and their familiarity with the data prior.
